description:
**Fix Overview**:

To address the Windows Mobile Broadband driver remote code execution vulnerability (CVE-2024-30005), you should apply the relevant updates provided by Microsoft:

1. Download the update packages for your respective version of Windows from the Microsoft Update Catalog.
2. Install the updates by following the instructions provided on the download page.
3. Restart your system to ensure the updates take effect.

**Details**:
- Updates are available for multiple Windows versions including Windows 10 and Windows 11. 
- The specific KB articles relevant to your build should be referred to for installation guidance: 
  - For Windows 11, refer to KB5037771 for Version 23H2, KB5037770 for Version 21H2.
  - For Windows 10, refer to KB5037768.
- For manual installations, the update packages can be found here:
  - [KB5037771](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5037771)
  - [KB5037770](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5037770)
  - [KB5037768](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5037768).
  (LLM Synthesized)

**Preconditions**:
- Ensure that your system version matches the update concerns.
- Backup critical data before proceeding with the installations.
